texts.text: Providing qualified and well-trained Faculty members, using a well-rounded curriculum on academic subjects, technical courses, and job readiness programs.
Providing continuing education and training to its Faculty and Staff.
Providing adequate facilities, tools, and equipment for the students' exposure and practical training in their respective courses.
Inculcating discipline and a high sense of responsibility among students.
Actively soliciting the participation of selected industries in providing apprenticeship training to students with practicum requirements.
Preparing students for their entry into the world of work and entrepreneurship.
